page.title: 05A STUDY OF THE RAILWAY
page.content: A section of the main railway line between London Liverpool Street and East Anglia is in our area.Our surveys were carried out during the morning,afternoon and early evening in half-hour sessions. In the morning there were only a few trains from London,but they passed every 2 minutes to London.By mid- afternoon trains were travelling from London every 5 minutes and to London every 3 minutes.The trains were still frequent probably to cater for shoppers and visitors to London. Early evening was the busiest time.Trains were coming from London every 1 or 2 minutes.These trains bring workers home from London to the eastern suburbs as well as shoppers and visitors. A new feature on the line since May 1985 is the faster electric train.
